short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track time. Locally, private and without requiring a login.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Track time spent on projects, tasks or anything else directly in your browser.
No accounts are required, the project names and time spent never leaves your device so you don't have to worry about leaking project names and budgets accidentaly.
